programme.title: America's Test Kitchen

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen

programme.desc: In this episode, we set out to develop ultimate versions of two favorite chocolate desserts: chocolate mousse and chocolate cupcakes.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Lemon Bundt cake, glazed with a snowy white icing, is an elegant dessert but is often lacking in lemon flavor. Key lime pie is another favorite, but transporting this pie and it's wobbly filling, can be tricky. We set out to solve both these problems.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Australia's Uncle Toby's International Ironman Competition comes to LA. The Baywatch girls think all is fair in sports and convince the guys that they should compete as equals, setting the stage for a series of pranks between the men and women.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Controversy generated by Donna's appearance in Playboy magazine divides the Baywatch lifeguards. When an earthquake triggers a rockslide, burying a bus full of junior lifeguards, Mitch, Samantha, Cody and Donna try to rescue them.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: After rescuing a group of fishermen and tourists from a pier fire, Samantha and L.A. fire chief Captain Huntingdon form an elite joint Search and Rescue unit. Meanwhile, Cody asks CJ to paint his portrait, and Mitch receives some strange PI work.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Donna and Caroline work with Heal the Bay after a recent rainstorm washes inland pollutants into the waters off Santa Monica. Mitch falls ill after he unknowing swims over sunken drums of toxic chemicals.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch has been chosen Flash Magazine's Bachelor of the Month, a designation that leads to wild complications. Stephanie is making plans for her wedding to Tom, but her sister Caroline keeps getting in the way.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Stephanie and Tom go on their honeymoon in a two-mast schooner with a group of troubled teenagers, with Mitch and Neely along for help. All is going well until they get trapped in a hurricane and the ship starts sinking!

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch gets his “15 minutes of fame” when he rescues Jay Leno from choking, and a female talk show host from drowning. Caroline and CJ adopt a stray dog swimming in the ocean that mystically reminds them of Stephanie.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: After Caroline, Neely and Manny rescue three orphan teenage boys from drowning, Caroline seeks out the enigmatic, mysterious youth who helped her rescue one of the boys. Neely's ex-husband returns, complicating her life.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Manny is haunted by his past when two juvenile delinquents from his home borough in East LA arrive at Baywatch for community service. Meanwhile, Neely suspects Mitch and Samantha are becoming more than coworkers.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a young couple’s romance is threatened by their parents, they make a pact to end their lives together rather than end their romance. Meanwhile, Cody encounters a mermaid while diving, and of course no one believes him… except CJ.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: While testing new scuba diving technology, Sam, Neely and Caroline witness a jet crash. They rescue the pilot, who reveals that he was transporting a canister that contains a deadly virus. Meanwhile, the team must shut down an illegal nude beach.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the angry and bitter mother of a drowning victim. CJ babysits a neighbor’s newborn and realizes she wants to be a mother. But is Cody ready to be a father?

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: CJ and Cody transport an injured sea lion to the animal recovery facility at Sea World. While there, Samantha gets the idea to promote lifeguarding by planning a Baywatch-theme stunt show at Sea World.

programme.title: Bellator 178: Straus vs Pitbull 4

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA returns to London with a stacked card featuring a showdown between top welterweights Paul “Semtex” Daley and Rory MacDonald, along with appearanc-es from Michael “MVP” Page, Cheick Kongo, Baby Slice and Liam McGeary.

programme.title: Bellator NYC: Sonnen vs Silva
programme.desc: Bellator MMA invades Madison Square Garden in NY with a blockbuster card. Chael Sonnen and Wanderlei Silva in a long-awaited grudge match. The double main event also sees Fedor Emelianenko taking on Matt Mitrione. Also, Douglas Lima and Michael Chandler!

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA is live with its biggest show ever from Madison Square Garden featuring new signee Ryan Bader taking on Champ Phil Davis for the Light Heavyweight belt. Irish phenom James Gallagher taking on KO artist Chinzo Machida.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA takes place in Thackerville, Oklahoma with a rubber match between two veteran standouts as Brandon Girtz meets Derek Campos in a main event sure to produce fireworks! The stacked card also features fights with Joe Warren and Kendall Grove.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA is from Verona, New York with a Middleweight showdown as Chidi Njokuani takes on former champ Andrey Koreshkov. Heavy-handed Brennan Ward will face off against Fernando Gonzalez in the co-main slot.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA comes home to San Jose, California with a collision between top lightweights as Patricky Pitbull meets Benson Henderson. Plus the Bellator debut of Roy “Big Country” Nelson when he faces hard-hitting Javy Ayala in a heavyweight battle.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Hacia lo inimaginable
programme.desc: El asesino en serie Thomas Wilder desafía a Danny con un mensaje en su última víctima, convirtiendo el juego del gato y el ratón en una venganza personal.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La milla extra
programme.desc: Erin y Anthony emprenden una búsqueda para encontrar a un testigo clave que huyó por miedo a represalias y convencerlo de testificar.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Boomerang
programme.desc: Estalla la indignación pública cuando no se procesa a un policía que disparó a un adolescente, afectando a Frank, el alcalde y la oficina de Erin. Danny busca al autor de un posterior tiroteo contra un oficial, posible caso de venganza.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando Morgan es secuestrado, la UAC se apresura a buscarlo y salvarle la vida.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se dirige a Wichita en busca de un sospechoso que secuestra niños mientras sus padres duermen. Además, Morgan está intentando averiguar quién fue el responsable del ataque.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando un sujeto ataca a la UAC, el equipo entra en acción para averiguar quién es el responsable.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la ex miembro del equipo de la UAC y actual agente de la Interpol, Emily Prentiss localiza a un asesino en serie internacional, pide la ayuda de sus amigos de la UAC.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Mientras que el equipo de NCIS investiga el asesinato de un oficial del Mossad en Virginia, Tony y Ziva viajan a Berlín para rastrear al asesino de su padre.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Ignorando las órdenes de Seguridad Nacional, el equipo busca a Bodnar para vengar las muertes de Eli David y Jackie Vance.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Un investigador del Departamento de Defensa analiza la responsabilidad del equipo en el caso Bodnar; el equipo debe determinar si un contramaestre está sufriendo de paranoia o no al declarar que estaba siendo perseguido.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: La búsqueda internacional del asesino de Eli David y Jackie Vance da un giro cuando comienza una cacería de brujas federal contra Gibbs y su equipo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La milla extra
programme.desc: Erin y Anthony emprenden una búsqueda para encontrar a un testigo clave que huyó por miedo a represalias y convencerlo de testificar.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Boomerang
programme.desc: Estalla la indignación pública cuando no se procesa a un policía que disparó a un adolescente, afectando a Frank, el alcalde y la oficina de Erin. Danny busca al autor de un posterior tiroteo contra un oficial, posible caso de venganza.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El bien común
programme.desc: El mundo de Danny se sacude cuando Robert Lewis (Michael Imperioli), de la oficina del Fiscal General, obtiene nuevas pruebas en su contra en el caso de tiroteo en defensa propia del asesino en serie Thomas Wilder.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Steve Austin invites the first eight women to visit the ranch. The last woman standing will take on the new Skullbuster for a shot at $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight tough badasses are ready to rumble. But will they have what it takes to get through Snatch, Loaded and Cranked? The last man standing earns the right to take on the Skullbuster for a chance to win $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight stout badass women arrive at the ranch to face off in Snatch, Barn Burner and Cranked before they get a chance at the Skullbuster and a shot at $10,000 if they can beat the benchmark time.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: In this highly contentious Broken Skull Challenge, eight tough as nails male athletes compete in Trench Warfare, Loaded and Hard Labor for a chance to win $10,000. Will their prayers be answered or will their dreams be shattered

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight new competitors try and prove they are the toughest badass in the country. The winner moves on to face the Skullbuster and a chance at Steve Austin's $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight hardcore athletes have come to the Broken Skull Challenge to go head to head in Rip Off, Ass Kicker and Grip & Rip. The winner goes on to face Steve's Skullbuster for a chance at $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Another eight tough as nails women come to the ranch with one goal in mind - making it to the Skullbuster. Will the one who succeeds walk away with $10,000?

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: It's the last men's episode of the season and Steve has brought in his toughest group yet. Will one of them have what it takes to beat the Skullbuster and take home $10,000?

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: The last group of eight elite female athletes comes to the ranch in search of the title of Broken Skull Ranch Champion and $10,000.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: Steve Austin hosts this bunch of 12 rough and rowdy good old boys and girls on an uninhabited paradise, as they battle each other for $100,000 in cold hard cash.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: A new redneck in peak physical condition arrives on the island challenging established relationships. The contestants are already tired of canned food, the contestants decide to hunt for an alternate protein source: LIZARD!

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: As the castaway rednecks hunt for jungle veggies, they learn that you shouldn¹t search for food in the area that used to be the latrine.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: With one team dominating, Steve makes a surprise announcement that makes tensions run high on the island; the rednecks are excited about the arrival of some new critters in the camp and must decide where they fall on the food chain.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: Redneck Island explodes with excitement when a crate of heavenly ice-cold beer washes up onshore. The party is short-lived, however, when Steve Austin informs them he has alternate plans for their precious beverage.

programme.title: The Wonder List

programme.title: The Wonder List
programme.desc: Aired 10/07/2017. What’s the best way to protect paradise? In stunning Patagonia, an American conservationist has purchased vast tracts of land to the fury of local developers.

programme.title: The Wonder List
programme.desc: Aired 10/14/2017. As deforestation rages and unique species vanish, the fight is on to save one of the planet’s most special places before it is ruined forever.

programme.title: Declassified
programme.desc: Aired 6/19/2016. At the height of the Cold War, the CIA recruited a Soviet diplomat with the code name TRIGON to gain valuable intelligence from inside the Soviet Union.

programme.title: Declassified
programme.desc: Aired 6/26/2016. A Defense Intelligence Agency interrogator and U.S Special Forces work together to find missing Iraqi dictator Saddam Hussein.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown

programme.title: The History of Comedy

programme.title: The History of Comedy

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police break up a street-racing ring, a driver tries to make light of his drug-possession charge, and a woman with a felony arrest warrant is fixated on her oral hygiene.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Carjacking victims flag down officers whom then locate, pursue and acquire the stolen vehicle, and a man admits to officers the car he's driving is stolen.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man who threatened his neighbors redirects his anger toward the deputies, and a driver in crisis puts the lives of others on the line.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspicious man attempts to flee Police on foot and is later arrested for possession. Officers in New Jersey charge a garage owner with receiving stolen property. Officers arrest a man after witnesses report purse snatching.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An unstable man in a standoff with officers begs to be shot, a drunk woman is accused of beating her spouse, and unwanted guests occupy the garage of an out-of-town homeowner.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police try to settle a dispute between roommates, a jilted man causes a disturbance at a public park twice in one day, and an erratic driver proves to be surprisingly sober.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A traffic stop escalates to a dangerous situation, a woman admits to hitting her dad in the face with her teeth, and a defiant driver doesn't want deputies to search his car.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A generous boyfriend steps in to prevent his girlfriend from going to jail. Officers save a kitten who wants to hide in a dangerous place. A man says he’s been driving a stolen truck for one day, but he’s off by a few months.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man wearing women’s underwear exposes himself. While on patrol officers question a naked man in the backseat of a vehicle who explains to officers that he’s camping. It takes several officers to take down a deranged naked man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers stop a suspicious pedestrian, police and their K-9 dog search for weapons in a suspect's vehicle, and a wanted woman is stopped on a moped with her pet dog.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An intoxicated man suspected of domestic abuse refuses to obey deputies' orders, police find drugs in a woman's car, and an alleged prostitute encounters the police.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A motorcycle with no license plate crashes while fleeing from Deputies. A woman driving a car with no windshield blames her ex-boyfriend. A gun is found hidden in a seat during a traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers suspect meth use by a man sleeping in a bus station, a pedestrian's multiple bags of drugs suggest trafficking, and a drunk driver claims she was set up.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A jumpy bicyclist mistakenly reveals more than he had planned, and officers search a darkened building in an attempt to thwart a robbery in progress.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police pursue a stolen motorcycle that turns into a foot chase. A domestic violence call results in the arrest of an abusive stepdad. Officers respond after a fight over cigarettes escalate.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A motorcyclist wanted by police hides out in his mom's garage, a man won't leave his ex-fiancee alone, and a pregnant woman gets busted for meth possession.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Spike strips are used to end a pursuit, but not before a woman falls out. A passenger flees from a stop and changes clothes. A woman from Oklahoma driving a windowless car admits to using meth.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers apprehend a skittish suspect, a father-to-be leads police on a foot chase, and police struggle to get the truth from a wanted man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer pursues suspects for reckless driving, police respond to the armed robbery of a pizza delivery driver, and a deputy detects a unique scent during a traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A pair of suspects on the run pretend they were busy napping. A man reaches for something in his pocket, but denies knowing what it is. A family calls the police after their roommate brandishes a gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A sibling reluctantly called authorities when his belligerent brother refused to leave his mother's home. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local grocery store. Officers investigate a suspicious vehicle parked at a local gas station.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer subdues a young man in mental duress before paramedics arrive to treat him. Officers stop a suspicious vehicle and find drug paraphernalia inside the woman's car. Officers respond to a robbery in progress.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man with a suspended license flees a routine traffic stop on foot. Deputies respond to a battered woman after receiving a 911 hang up call. A sting operation nets a suspected drug dealer.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Detectives stop a vehicle leaving a known drug house and find a loaded concealed gun while searching one of the passengers. Local residents complain about a loud neighbor. A man is spotted walking down a road with a saw.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police respond to a fight in progress call, officers tail a vehicle leaving a house known for drug activity, and a man calls the police after his wife pushes his Harley over.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect is apprehended after trying to evade arrest, a convicted felon is detained when police make some illegal discoveries in his van, and deputies seize a repeat offender.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man is questioned for assaulting a woman on a train. A man is arrested for burglarizing a casino, he initially denies the charges but surveillance footage corroborates. A father kicks his son out of the house after his drinking becomes problematic.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Catherine investigate the murder of a wealthy couple who are found outside their home, which was up for sale.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom suspects murder when the body of a dwarf is found hanging from a rope high above a stage in a casino hotel where a convention of little people is being held.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Warrick, and Sara investigate when a woman vanishes while taking part in a magician's act.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Fifteen years ago, Catherine helped put a man on death row for the rape and murder of a coed at a nearby college. The man is about to be executed when he's granted a stay based on new DNA evidence.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A boxing champ dies in the ring after taking a brutal beating from his nemesis, but Grissom finds evidence that points to murder.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine is called in by a pornographic-film developer to view graphic footage from a snuff movie in which a woman is brutally slain.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A cab driver seems to run over a boy and is then beaten to death by a mob for racial reasons.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Warrick, and Nick investigate the case of a man who apparently was murdered and pushed off a six-story building.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Catherine investigate the grisly meat grinder murder at a slaughterhouse.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Some bird watchers find a raven with a human eyeball in its mouth. Warrick and Grissom look into the circumstances of David's unusual and first autopsy.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Warrick investigates the drive by murder of a young girl in his old neighborhood.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine takes the point in the investigation of an escalating series of peeping tom incidents.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A man driving with a wooden stake in his head dies in front of a casino.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: An elderly woman crashes her car into a crowded restaurant. One of the patrons is Sara's paramedic boyfriend. Grissom and Nick investigate the possible carbon monoxide murder of a woman in her home.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un taxista parece atropellar a un niño y luego es apaleado hasta la muerte por una turba por motivos raciales.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Warrick y Nick investigan el caso de un hombre que aparentemente fue asesinado y empujado desde un edificio de seis pisos.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y Catherine investigan el espeluznante asesinato de una picadora de carne en un matadero.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Unos observadores de aves encuentran un cuervo con un globo ocular humano en la boca. Warrick y Grissom investigan las circunstancias de la inusual y primera autopsia de David.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Warrick investiga el asesinato en coche de una joven en su antiguo barrio.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine toma la iniciativa en la investigación de una serie creciente de incidentes de mirones.

programme.title: CSI

programme.title: Frasier

programme.title: Cheers

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam and Rebecca are dressed-up for the USS Constitution tour, but their respective dates cancel.

programme.title: Cheers

programme.title: Los Dos Rivales
programme.desc: Los Treviño y Los Guereña mantienen una rivalidad originada muchos años atrás. Por necesidad de dinero, el heredero de los Treviño, y la heredera de los Guereña, tienen que disfrazarse usando ropa del sexo opuesto para proteger y vender sus ranchos.

programme.title: Rosario
programme.desc: Una mujer mata accidentalmente a su marido mientras actuaba en una obra de teatro.

programme.title: El Quijote
programme.desc: Rocinante tiene un romance del que sale golpeado, al igual que su dueño. Don Quijote y Sancho llegan a una venta donde son nuevamente golpeados y Sancho queda mantado por que Don Quijote no quiere pagarle al ventero.

programme.title: Los Alegres Aguilares
programme.desc: El aventurero Manuel se encuentra con Carlos, quien es casi idéntico a él. Uno es de familia rica y el otro no. Entonces Manuel le ofrece dinero a Carlos para que se haga pasar por él con una señorita con la cual no se quiere casar.

programme.title: Los Dos Rivales
programme.desc: Los Treviño y Los Guereña mantienen una rivalidad originada muchos años atrás. Por necesidad de dinero, el heredero de los Treviño, y la heredera de los Guereña, tienen que disfrazarse usando ropa del sexo opuesto para proteger y vender sus ranchos.

programme.title: El Norte
programme.desc: Celebremos el 35 aniversario de la nominada al Oscar "El norte" en una exquisita restauración de este clásico sobre inmigrantes guatemaltecos, que huyen de la violencia y buscan una vida mejor en Estados Unidos.

programme.title: No sin mi hija
programme.desc: Sally Field ofrece una interpretación electrizante en esta convincente historia real de Betty Mahmoody, una mujer estadounidense que, junto con su hija, queda atrapada en Irán, engañada por su marido al visitar su país natal.

programme.title: La hija del general
programme.desc: Existe la forma correcta, la forma equivocada y la forma del ejército. Pero bajo ninguna circunstancia, el investigador militar Paul Brenner ayudará a los oficiales de Fort MacCallum a encubrir el motivo de la muerte de una hermosa oficial.

programme.title: Amores peligrosos
programme.desc: En este drama criminal, Matthew McConaughey (El club de los desahuciados) interpreta a un reportero que regresa a su ciudad natal de Florida para investigar un caso que involucra a un preso condenado a muerte.

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda
programme.desc: Cuando Paul Rusesabagina (Cheadle) ve que el mundo no va a intervenir en la masacre de la minoría tutsi, encuentra el coraje para abrir las puertas de su hotel a más de 1.200 refugiados.

programme.title: Códigos de guerra

programme.title: El señor de la guerra
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage, ganador de un Oscar®, protagoniza esta historia tensa y llena de acción sobre un famoso traficante de armas que vendió armas a dictadores y consiguió eludir la ley durante casi veinte años.

programme.title: Desapareció una noche

programme.title: Anna Nicole (LAS)
programme.desc: Anna Nicole Smith pasó de ser una madre soltera a los 17 años, a convertirse en un símbolo sexual. Se casa con un billonario de 63 años, lucha por su herencia y sufre la muerte de su hijo de 39 años.

programme.title: Feo de día, lindo de noche
programme.desc: Un hombre que desea ser lindo para poder vivir una vida de privilegio en una sociedad que le atribuye a la belleza el éxito. Pero no sabe que su gran deseo se convertirá en su mayor desafío.

programme.title: Por un puñado de besos

programme.title: Complices
programme.desc: Un seductor experto lleva a su sobrino en un viaje a la playa en busca de mujeres calientes. Pero la única mujer capaz de causarle problemas, aparece allí.

programme.title: Pobres divas
programme.desc: Nora y Mary solo conocen la buena vida en Beverly Hills, pero la fortuna de papá se esfuma. Una tía las toma bajo su protección, pero ella vive del "otro lado de la ciudad". Ríete mientras las princesas se embarcan en la mayor aventura de sus vidas.

programme.title: En nombre del amor

programme.title: Kickboxer

programme.title: El hombre sin pasado

programme.title: I Am Wrath

programme.desc: Cuando un hombre es asesinado a tiros en su propio garaje, la policía descubre que una herida sufrida por la afligida viuda puede haber sido autoinfligida.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Crimen limpio
programme.desc: Una empleada de una tintorería fue violada y asesinada en la tienda. La policía recurrió a la ciencia forense en busca de las respuestas que necesitaban.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Mientras estaba de vacaciones en California, Earl Morris se entera de que su esposa ha desaparecido de su casa en Arizona. La búsqueda de Ruby Morris involucra a decenas de investigadores y científicos – incluyendo también a la Guardia Costera.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1992, Dawn Bruce, de 22 años, es brutalmente asesinada en su apartamento de Virginia. Los investigadores notan una mancha de sangre en la funda de una almohada que parece haber sido hecha por uno de los dedos del asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Durante siete años, un trío de hombres robó un banco tras otro. Siempre se escapaban antes de que llegara la policía y no dejaban pruebas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En la escena de un asesinato horrible, el asesino se esforzó mucho para poder borrar sus huellas dactilares y oscurecer las huellas de zapatos que dejó cuando arrastraba los rastros de sangre en el piso.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After the shooting at Degrassi, the full school board counseling response team moves in. And so does the media. Local reporter, Rachel Roberts, has decided to make Sean the hero of her piece.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Craig has a problem – the recording deal he and his band won last year is about to expire, but “Downtown Sasquatch” is nowhere near ready to record. With Jimmy in the hospital, they’re missing a key member.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Craig’s back with Ashley and he’s determined not to screw it up this time.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Distraught when Ashley refuses his proposal, Craig falls into a major rage, completely trashing his hotel room.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Degrassi has a new hottie in Grade 9 and Manny’s got her eye on him. Especially since her “boyfriend” Spinner can’t even be bothered to take a night off work to come to the Cupid Dance she’s organized.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Something’s wrong with Emma. Though she’s frustrated at being treated with kid gloves by everyone since the school shooting, she’s not sure how she’d rather be treated. So she just keeps going on, numbly reassuring everyone that she’s fine.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma steps into the lead role in Dracula, but her recent extra-curricular activities with Jay prove even more dramatic.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner has difficulty dealing with the return of injured Jimmy. He hasn’t talked to him since the shooting, and his guilt over what he did leaves him unable to welcome Jimmy back to school.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ellie is finding it hard to make ends meet now that she’s living on her own and hates relying on her mother for rent, especially with its obligatory dinners to pick up the cheque.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige and Matt are totally in love, so what if they have to keep it secret? It’s worth all the extra effort.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: With school coming to a close, Marco is making huge plans for his summer with Dylan – and their future. He’s considering fast-tracking to graduate high school, joining Dylan in university a year earlier.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After dutifully picking up the Spirit Squad slack for a love-struck Paige all year, Manny feels betrayed when Paige claims all the glory. So Manny plots her revenge with a complicated cheer that leaves Paige with a broken leg on Prom Night.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley’s leaving for the summer, and the idea of their temporary farewell and the stress of writing a song for Kevin Smith’s movie -- is making him, well, nuts. So Craig decides to do whatever it takes to follow her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Frustrated by everything around him, Craig runs away. As he wanders the street, he befriends a young busker nicknamed, “Skinny”.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As Paige and Spinner awkwardly discuss last night's surprising kiss-fest, Darcy interrupts. She regrets their fight and breakup. But Spinner tells her he meant what he said – if Darcy can’t accept him, past and all, they're through.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Another year at Degrassi kicks off and Manny decides she’s going to be a serious actress, whatever it takes.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s still foggy on what exactly it was that happened at Peter’s party the night before. She knows she made a pretty racy video but Peter will erase everything… or so he says.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige has got her whole life mapped out. She plans on being accepted into the marketing program at the best university in Canada.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: JT has got his license. He’s got a steady girlfriend in Liberty, who happens to be Student Council President. So why is he feeling anything but a “man”? Because Liberty’s in control.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After all the craziness of last year, Craig has one overriding goal: no drama. He’s focused on his friends, his family, his studies, and his band – a reconstituted Downtown Sasquatch but no Spinner - a new addition is rocking the drum-kit…

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After proving he’s still got talent on the hardwood, Jimmy is invited to try out for the Wheelchair Basketball Association’s Junior Team. It’s Jimmy’s second chance at athletic stardom, and an opportunity to make his father proud.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As Liberty’s pregnancy enters its sixth month, she and JT are forced to face reality: even though no longer a couple, they have to deal with the pregnancy.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Desperate for cash, JT has stolen drugs from the pharmacy… He becomes entangled in a web between his boss, the drug dealer, and the police.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Someone’s definitely interested in Marco. But as it turns out, Tim is interested in Marco, but not for the expected reason. Tim knows Marco is gay, and has been struggling with how to come out to his friends and family.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The one-year anniversary of the school shooting is approaching and everyone’s feeling the weight of it. Not least of whom is Spinner Mason, still persona non grata.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Tonight is the premiere of “Jay and Silent Bob Go Canadian, Eh” and with many of the students and faculty on the guest list, it’s like the whole school is gripped in movie premiere fever!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige wakes Alex up in her bed – Paige spent the night on the floor – and as the two girls awkwardly prepare for school, they try to avoid the elephant in the room. As in, that they KISSED last night. What happened?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick decides to get back at his bullies, hitting them right where it hurts – their cars. But when Jimmy becomes a member of the “Whack Your Brain” team, the two form a truce.

programme.title: Land of Giants: A Walking With Dinosaurs Special
programme.desc: Witness the spectacle of the fearsome predator Giganotosaurus.

programme.title: The Giant Claw: A Walking With Dinosaurs Special
programme.desc: Zoologist Nigel Marvin travels back in time on a prehistoric safari.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Scientists study the perfectly preserved remains of an adolescent allosaurus they call Big Al.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: This scientific detective story traces the evidence for Big Al the allosaur's existence, using clues from climate change studies, forensics, and fossil records to bring him back to life.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs: Shortbites
programme.desc: Featured species are the coelophysis and the diplodocus.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs: Shortbites
programme.desc: Featured species are the opthalmosaurus and the ornithocheirus.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs: Shortbites
programme.desc: Featured species are the leaellynasaura and the tyrannosaurus.

programme.title: The Making Of: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Animatronics, computer animation and science re-create the dinosaurs' world.

programme.title: Walking With Cavemen
programme.desc: The lives of cavemen were nasty, brutish and short, but somehow they evolved over 3.5 million years into homo sapiens.

programme.title: Walking With Cavemen
programme.desc: Two very different species compete for survival in Africa 2,000,000 years ago.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Special effects-filled documentary beginning 49 million years ago. The world is heavily forested and birds rule the planet, preying on small mammals. Whales have not yet evolved and their ancestors walk on the land.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: A pregnant basilosaurus, an 18-metre, carnivorous whale which lives in the Tethys Sea, is forced to kill the young of a smaller whale to ensure the survival of her unborn calf.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Going back 25 million years to the time of the indricothere, which was the largest mammal ever to live on dry land, being seven metres high and weighing 15 tons! The only threat to an adult would have been the hyaenadon which was the size of a rhino.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: The beginnings of mankind can be traced back 3.2 million years to Ethiopia and the advent of Australopithecus, a type of ape which, like humans, was bipedal. These early members of the human family faced many dangers, including the sabre-toothed cat.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Revealing the exotic, oversized creatures that inhabited South America one million years ago, such as the deadly smilodon, the largest of all sabre tooth cats.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Looking at the depths of the Ice Age, following a group of mammoths who have been forced to travel south with the advent of winter. On a dangerous journey across the Alps, many become trapped in bogs or fall victim to predators.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The evolution of the predators who lived 550 million years ago, and how the first amphibians migrated from sea to land.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Three hundred million years ago, the forests were ruled by insects. This was a world in which giant dragonflies battled with two-foot-wide spiders.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: On the supercontinent Pangea, early therapsids, creatures more similar to mammals than reptiles, fight for survival alongside other animals. In the carboniferous swamps, insects and arthropods take over and grow into giants.

programme.title: Science of Walking With Beasts
programme.desc: This episode explains how the 120-million-year reign of the dinosaurs ended when mammals became the fastest and fiercest creatures on the planet.

programme.title: Science of Walking With Beasts
programme.desc: A look at the science that has proved Darwin's idea that intelligent, sophisticated humans have an ancestral connection with the ape.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Daleks
programme.desc: The Doctor and Susan are once again taken prisoner by the Daleks. In the mountains, Ian, Barbara, and the Thals must negotiate a vast chasm to reach the city.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Daleks

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Edge of Destruction
programme.desc: The Doctor and his crew begin to act strangely after a mysterious explosion on the TARDIS.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Edge of Destruction

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Aztecs
programme.desc: The crew venture out of the TARDIS into 15th Century Mexico and to the tomb of the Aztec High Priest Yetaxa. When Barbara stumbles upon the Aztecs they mistake her for a reincarnation of the High Priest himself.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Aztecs
programme.desc: Barbara's interference in the Aztec practice of human sacrifice casts doubt over her supposed divinity and puts the whole crew in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Ian faces a challenge.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Aztecs
programme.desc: Barbara's divine powers are challenged and she humiliates Tlotoxl, the Hight Priest of Sacrifice, who determines to prove her mortality. Meanwhile, the Doctor becomes romantically involved.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Aztecs
programme.desc: It is the day of the solar eclipse when Susan is to be punished for her refusal to marry. Can the Doctor and his companions escape before they are sacrificed to the Sun God?

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Planet of Giants
programme.desc: The crew arrive in a place where everything is on a giant scale, the result of the TARDIS doors malfunctioning. They are soon made acutely aware of the nefarious plans of a ruthless businessman and his misguided scientist.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Planet of Giants
programme.desc: The Doctor realises that the government scientist, Farrow, has been murdered while Barbara inadvertently comes into contact with the poisonous strain of insecticide.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Planet of Giants
programme.desc: The Doctor and Susan are reunited with Ian and Barbara. As Barbara's health rapidly deteriorates, the crew find the formula for DN6, the pesticide that Forrester was prepared to kill for, and which could now be responsible for killing Barbara.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion
programme.desc: The Doctor and his companions arrive in a London very different from what they remember.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion
programme.desc: Ian and his friend Larry are chased by the Slyther, protecting the Bedfordshire mines.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Romans

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Romans

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Romans

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Romans

programme.desc: The Doctor and his companions arrive on a planet which houses an all but forgotten museum. While touring it, they are horrified to discover that they themselves are exhibits in one of the cases. Can they avoid becoming just an exhibit in the space museum?

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Space Museum
programme.desc: As the Doctor and his companions move through the museum's vast labyrinth of corridors, the enslaved Xeron race sense an opportunity to topple their Morok invaders.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Space Museum
programme.desc: With the Doctor held captive by the Commander Lobos and destined to become an exhibit in the space museum, his companions are left to do whatever they can to break the chain of events.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Space Museum

programme.title: Nigel Marven's Cruise Ship Adventures
programme.desc: Nigel, gearing up in Buenos Aires, the tango capital, readies for an eighteen-day expedition to Antarctica. His quest: to spot wide-winged albatrosses, massive Humpback whales, Leopard seals, and charming black-and-white Gentoo penguins.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: The Hebrides - Land of Legends
programme.desc: Lying just off the coast of west Scotland, the Hebrides archipelago is made up of more than 500 islands and islets. Isolation from the mainland has made it the perfect breeding ground for millions of creatures.

programme.title: World's Wildest City: Anchorage
programme.desc: This city spends most of the year encased in ice…but when summer hits, Anchorage bursts into life. Animals and plants living this far north have been forced to adapt, working faster to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Island of the Penguins
programme.desc: In the middle of the Antarctic Ocean, an entire mountain range arises from the water: South Georgia, the nursery of the Antarctic. Hundreds of thousands of penguins, elephant seals, fur seals, and their young overcrowd the beaches.

programme.title: Zambezi Crescent
programme.desc: Moving the leadwood tree is proving to be nerve-wracking for Amanda, it isn't the heaviest tree for nothing.

programme.title: Wild Memoirs of a Film Crew
programme.desc: In this episode, the crew witness unbelievable athleticism as a lioness tackles an impala in midair. The crew share rhino incidents that were probably a bit too close for comfort. Startling encounters pursue with elephants that will never be forgotten.

programme.title: World's Wildest City: Anchorage
programme.desc: Anchorage is home to a huge number of wild porcupines, living in the city's parks, gardens, and streets. Almost twice the average size, Anchorage's porcupines search for food here in the city, and find refuge during the bitter Alaskan winters.

programme.title: Top Dive Sites
programme.desc: Raja Ampat

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Mak brings Angela back onto the prosecution team where she comes face to face with Tasha; Julio struggles to manage the primeras below him and Tommy's behavior; Tariq continues running with Kanan.

programme.title: 1-800-Missing
programme.desc: A woman fakes her own death to escape from her previous life.

programme.title: 1-800-Missing
programme.desc: A biophysicist goes missing after developing a deadly virus with no vaccine; Jess' mother and brother visit.

programme.title: 1-800-Missing
programme.desc: A pregnant woman is kidnapped and held for ransom.

programme.title: 1-800-Missing
programme.desc: The team searches for an abducted newborn.

programme.title: 1-800-Missing
programme.desc: A missing boy is found after a hurricane only to turn up missing again when he is taken to a hospital overwhelmed with victims from the storm.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: Tensions flare at Dondre and Janelle's over-the-top party; Johnny forces Tal to face the truth about who he is.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: Poppy and Janelle open up to one another; Rigo and Dondre grapple with the events of the party.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: Rigo goes viral; King makes a big reveal to Poppy.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: Sage Odom's tour auditions get underway; Uncle Al tries to save the twins; Collette and East-O's turbulent past comes to a head.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: Realizing what it takes to become professional dance squad; Rigo has questions after Eart-o's death.

programme.title: Step Up: High Water
programme.desc: The rivalry between Tal and Zo comes to a head; Davis meets Odalie's parents.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: Basie's sermon regarding inclusivity in the church goes viral, lighting a fire under Grace and provoking Bishop's suspicions; Kerissa pushes Jacob to get a day job.

programme.title: Greenleaf
programme.desc: A series of recurring nightmares leaves Grace unnerved; Charity looks to take her relationship with Jabari to the next level; Bishop gives Basie an ultimatum.

programme.title: Las hijas del Amapolo
programme.desc: Don Amapolo provoca temor en los pobladores, sobre todo en los hombres, ya que es el padre de cuatro bellas jóvenes.

programme.title: Encrucijada
programme.desc: Historias reales sobre la bifurcación del camino de diferentes personas, que llevan a cambios en el futuro y hacen frente a una encrucijada.

programme.title: Retofamosos
programme.desc: Seis famosos son reunidos en una azotea para enfrentar los retos más atrevidos, graciosos, chuscos y hasta arriesgados en donde el glamour y la fama se quedan atrás para dar paso a la diversión y el buen humor.

programme.title: A que no puedes
programme.desc: Emocionante juego que enfrenta a dos equipos de celebridades en su intento por realizar pruebas y retos únicos. El equipo que complete con éxito la tarea, ganará dinero para una obra de ayuda social.

programme.title: 100 latinos dijeron
programme.desc: Dos familias competirán respondiendo a distintas preguntas por la oportunidad de ganar dinero basados en las respuestas más populares, de acuerdo a las previamente respondidas por 100 latinos alrededor de Estados Unidos.

programme.title: Mi sueño es bailar
programme.desc: Celebridades ayudan a los participantes a hacer sus sueños realidad. Durante cada episodio la pareja con más puntos obtiene la oportunidad de escoger cual sueño se hará realidad.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Survivors of Nazi atrocities recognized Archbishop Trifa, former head of the Romanian Orthodox Church in America, as having directed a bloody attack against Jews during World War II. He was deported in 1984 and died three years later.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A serial rapist is on the loose in a Texas town. No one knew where he'd strike next, but the audacity of his attacks and the escalation of violence against his victims made finding him imperative.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an elderly couple died in a suspicious house fire, their son became the prime suspect. Investigators turned to forensic science to determine if the fire had been set deliberately, or if it was an unfortunate accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A twelve-year-old girl claimed she had been abducted and sexually assaulted. She recounted what happened in such a flat, unemotional voice that police found it difficult to believe her. Fibers on her clothing would prove she was telling the truth.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When convenience store employee Wanda Mason is found dead, investigators find the entire murder has been caught on the store's security camera. But the image of the killer is so degraded it seems impossible to positively identify him.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, the Amtrak Railroad experienced the deadliest train crash in United States history when the Sunset Limited derailed while crossing Alabama's Big Bayou Canot bridge. 47 passengers and crew were killed; scores more were injured.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A neighbor watched as a man stabbed his wife, pushed her into the swimming pool and held her head under water. The husband, however, had no recollection of the crime. A jury would have to decide between evidence and the mysteries of the mind.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Foul play is suspected when Fort Worth factory worker Glenda Furch disappears after completing her shift.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On May 20, 2001, Carrie Nelson was beaten to death while working alone in a park office. The case went unsolved for six years. Finally, police found a match with DNA samples gathered from the crime scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The victim had ingested a massive amount of cyanide. An unlikely clue — a flaw on a mailing envelope — exposed a murderer who was willing to kill innocent people.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1989, the dead bodies of Joan Rogers and her two teenage daughters were found floating in Tampa Bay.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of a young girl was discovered on isolated farmland near Delano, California. She had no ID, but police found mailbox keys in the pocket of her jeans. With no other clues, they checked the mailboxes of every apartment building in Delano.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When investigators found Bruce Miller dead in the office of his junkyard business, the crime scene was almost pristine. But when a computer forensics expert examined computers owned by the victim's wife and her lover, he found all the evidence needed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Casino security cameras tracked a young woman's movements until shortly before she disappeared. She was never seen again, but through the evidence she left behind, she was able to tell investigators what happened to her and who was responsible.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Soon after organizing a workers' strike, a union official is executed in his home. Neither his wife nor anyone in the neighborhood hear any gunshots. It takes a forensic sound test, an electron microscope and a nightgown to explain why.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Susie Mowbray was charged in her husband's death. Her son was so convinced of her innocence that he enrolled in law school, studied all of the evidence and, eventually, discovered the truth of what really happened between his parents.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1988, the body of a young woman was discovered in an Ohio river. Most of the evidence had been washed away, but the victim's 6-year-old son unwittingly told investigators all they needed to know — without saying a word. The clue was in his genes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1998, a Maryland murder mystery performance turns into a real whodunit when the badly burned body of Stephen Hricko is discovered in his hotel room.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1986, Gary Dale Larson was stabbed to death in his Edmond, Oklahoma home. The killer then sexually assaulted Larson's girlfriend, Janet Haynes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 29-year-old woman is killed instantly when a bomb explodes in her home. The device is so powerful that it embedded shrapnel in houses across the street. The bomber had not only knowledge and skill, but also a motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Young Navajos in the Southwest were dying at an alarming rate. The tribe's medicine men provided investigators with a critical clue that would lead halfway around the world to a most unlikely killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Within Arm's Reach
programme.desc: A police officer accused of killing his estranged wife insists she committed suicide. Investigators say it was murder — that it was physically impossible for the woman to have shot herself.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Indiana police identified Richard Alexander as the “River Park Rapist” who assaulted four women that year. Later, DNA analysis casts doubt on his conviction.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, the founder of American Atheists disappeared with one of her sons, her granddaughter and $500,000 in gold coins. The police investigated several suspects, including David R. Waters, who worked for American Atheists.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Without a Trace
programme.desc: After being admitted to the hospital with unexplained bleeding, 11-month-old Chad Shelton dies. Investigators and scientists frantically search for a cause when others from the same house fall ill.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A killer tries to incinerate everything that could link him to his crime. But in doing so, he inadvertently creates new forensic evidence. Detectives employ a technique never before used in a criminal investigation to bring it to light.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A brilliant young architect falls ill and dies just before she is to testify in a criminal trial. The autopsy reveals she'd been poisoned with arsenic. Investigators must determine who had a motive for murder.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los nueve Chefs restantes realizan una prueba de sabor a ciegas. Los ganadores cenan con el Chef Ramsay en un comedor completamente oscuro donde no pueden ver lo que están comiendo.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los Chefs restantes hacen crepes. Los ganadores cenarán en un restaurante francés mientras los perdedores se preparan para un servicio de cena con temática francesa.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los medallistas olímpicos de invierno Sasha Cohen y Jonny Moseley aparecen como jueces invitados. Para este desafío, todos los ingredientes deben provenir de Whistler, B.C.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los seis participantes restantes deben replicar los platos que les preparó el Chef Ramsay. Los ganadores cenarán con la ganadora de la cuarta temporada, Christina Machamer.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El desafío para cada uno de los concursantes restantes es hacer un plato que se vea y sepa igual. Los expertos de la revista 'Bon Appetit' ayudan al Chef Ramsay a juzgar.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los participantes conocen una versión en miniatura del Chef Ramsay: el actor y chico impresionista británico Felix Light. Deben preparar comidas sin carne para él y otros ochenta jóvenes.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En la primera parte del final de temporada, los tres concursantes restantes deberán preparar un plato con ingredientes de todo el mundo. Los jueces son un grupo de expertos culinarios internacionales.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En la parte final del final de temporada, los Chefs finales deben preparar platos dignos de Araxi, el restaurante y bar de ostras donde el ganador será el Chef.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día uno
programme.desc: Doce chefs compiten para impresionar a Gordon Ramsay. Ellos trabajan para abrir un renombrado restaurante en Los Ángeles. Ahí se descubre la próxima estrella culinaria.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día dos
programme.desc: Después de apenas sobrevivir la noche de apertura del restaurante Hell's Kitchen, los concursantes se preparan para su segundo servicio de cena.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día tres
programme.desc: Los chefs se preparan para su tercer servicio de cena, pero la presión de Hell's Kitchen es demasiado para un concursante.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día cuatro
programme.desc: Los concursantes intentan recrear los platos característicos de Gordon para un público exigente de Los Ángeles.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día cinco
programme.desc: Las tensiones surgen en la cocina durante la noche italiana. En el restaurante hay un equipo que quiere ganar jugando sucio.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día seis
programme.desc: En la primera mitad de este especial de dos horas, el chef Ramsay revela el último giro: cada equipo creará su propio menú que consta de tres aperitivos, platos principales y postres.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage

programme.title: Faster With Finnegan
programme.desc: It's not the size of the car that matters, it's how it's driven; Cotten and Newbern drastically improve the power-to-weight ratio of a teeny '72 Honda Z600 coupe in an attempt to set a record at MidPond Raceway.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Freiburger and Finnegan buy an '86 Trans Am and take it for its first road test on the drag-and-drive event Sick Week; with a swapped 350 V8 and a six-speed, the big question is whether they be able to make it faster each day or even finish the race.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: Recently, while the guys were thrashing the Crusher Impala, Freiburger spotted a 440-swapped '68 Dart he couldn't pass up. Now, the guys pick up the Dart and take it home to give it an impressive engine bay makeover and horsepower-adding tune-up.

programme.title: Faster With Finnegan

programme.title: Mexico: One Plate at a Time with Rick Bayless

programme.title: Mexico: One Plate at a Time with Rick Bayless

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati meets chef and historian Maru Toledo who is working to preserve and pass on some of Jalisco’s most important regional recipes. She then goes to Hacienda Romo for a first-hand look at the influence of hacienda culture.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati visits the birthplace of Mexico’s most famous spirit, the town of Tequila, where she learns about the history of tequila making and gets an up-close look at the whole process from the agave fields to the tasting table.

programme.title: Simply Ming

programme.desc: Kiaya is worried about co-parenting with X'Zayveon when he's released from prison and decides to establish parental custody. A lack of support from dad stirs up old feelings for Madisen, and Luke and Kayla take a big step in their relationship.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Brianna tries to get back in the dating game. Madisen and Christian reach a breaking point. Noah and Rachel move into their new house. Kiaya encourages Teazha to reconnect with her family. Kayla is having second thoughts after her engagement.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Madisen and Christian drive to Arkansas and stop in Tennessee to visit Rachel and celebrate Hazelee's 3rd birthday. Brianna worries about sending Braeson to a school that banned LGBTQ and BLM. Kayla decides that she and Luke should live separately.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: The Moms are all invited to LA for a photo shoot, but a misunderstanding leads to a fight that pits Kayla and Rachel against each other. Kayla gets upsetting news about her son Izaiah. Kiaya shares concerns about X'Zayveon being released from prison.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Brianna worries that Braeson may need some additional help with his missing limb. After Christian misses Camille's 2nd birthday. Rachel trys to plan a family vacation to Florida and X'Zayveon comes home from prison and sees Amour for the very first time.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Brianna takes Braeson to his first occupational therapy appointment. Madisen decides to stay in Arkansas. Rachel breaks up with Noah. Kiaya and Teazha open their home to X'Zayveon, and Kayla and Luke's relationship finally comes to an end.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Teen Mom Jenelle's partying forces her mom to take away custody and Leah tries to work things out with the father of her twins. Chelsea tries to get on track to graduate, while Kailyn is heartbroken after her breakup with Jo.

programme.title: La patrona

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Lucho e Irene descubren que Antonia es la dueña del prostíbulo La casa de las muñecas. Alejandro está encarcelado en el mismo lugar que el Lagarto. Rodrigo pide una orden de registro para entrar en casa de Guerra.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Gastón cuenta en su programa de radio que Antonia Guerra es la dueña del prostíbulo. Antonia hace firmar a Aníbal un documento donde pone sus bienes a nombre de ella, para protegerlos de Constanza.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Una bomba cae en San Pedro: Verónica hace circular fotos de cuando Antonia era prostituta y dueña del burdel. Alejandro se enoja con las imágenes, mientras Guerra no puede frenar los ataques en su contra. Chacón quiere colaborar con la justicia.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Fernando se emborracha, él se disculpa con Norma pero la tensión entre ellos es cada vez más explosiva y comete una locura. Rosario regresa al bar Alcalá y discute con Armando.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Ruth invita a Óscar a una exposición, Jimena no controla los celos que siente por su cuñado. Aumentan los conflictos entre los hermanos Reyes, Juan se opone a la manipulación de su hermano.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: La traición

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Hugo le devuelve a Soledad el anillo de compromiso que le quitó sin que ella se percatara, él le pide que ella lo busque si cambia su decisión, pero una confusión puede arruinarlo todo.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Soledad está decidida a entregarse a Hugo en una segunda oportunidad y cree que está con él en la cabaña. Arturo espera los resultados de la trampa que tiene planeada para el juez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama's paintings leave an art critic speechless, so Gomez sends for his friend, Sam Picasso, to teach Grandmama to paint in the abstract. The starving artist ignores Grandmama's and Morticia's work as he eats and paints.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Tears are shed as the claws come out in Tanzania and racers stand in amazement as they train alongside the Masai warriors.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The Race takes an unexpected turn when an early alliance is betrayed, and an unforgiving team savors the opportunity to exact their revenge in a game twist.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Gender disparities cause one Team to lose faith when a challenge seems insurmountable, and emotions run high as a Racer must weigh their own well-being against their future in the game.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: One determined Racer powers through pain in the wake of a physical misstep, and teams pull out all of the bells and whistles for a larger than life challenge.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final four Teams battle for the $1 million prize in a grueling two-hour season finale that starts in Japan, where Racers call upon their track skills for an exhausting Japanese game show, and concludes in Hawaii.

programme.title: Bob Ross: The Happy Painter

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross combines the simple elements of a sky, a mountain, and a lake to produce this ultra-soft tribute to nature.
