programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Black & White
programme.desc: What do penguins, skunks and colobus monkeys have in common? These colorful creatures will show everyone why black and white is unforgettable. Join in as Jack counts them down to number one!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Jungle Jack meets up with amazing animal moms and the little ones they care for. A jaguar looking after her cub, a baby bear sleeping alongside its mom, a white rhino protecting her calf, a cheetah mom in South Africa and whole herd of elephant mammas!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Gabon is home to some of the wildest beaches on the planet, and Pongara is no exception. Come along with Jack as he witnesses one of nature's most awe-inspiring feats -- one-ton Leatherback Sea Turtles returning to shore to lay their eggs.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Check out just how wild a zoo can get. Come along with Jack as he visits some of the most innovative Zoos around the world and meets creatures like, Orangutans, Koalas, Sea Lions, Camels, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Animals adapt to survive in some truly wild ways! Camels equipped for life in scorching heat, frigate birds donning red to attract a mate, geckos disappearing into the forest, musk oxen who don’t know the meaning of a bad hair day, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he meets up with researchers on the front-lines of animal conservation as they work to protect Elephants, Lions, Rattlesnakes, Bats and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he meets creatures armed with superb scales, like Nile Crocodiles, Galapagos Tortoises, Thorny Devils, an African Rock Python, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack, Suzi, and Kathaleen explore Phinda Game Reserve in South Africa alongside Lions, Hippos, Rhinos, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack visits the beautiful city of Quito, Ecuador, and the Quito Zoo for an incredible up-close encounter with a Jaguar and its newborn cub, and sees Andean Condor conservation in action.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Whether they cross huge distances in a single leap like kangaroos, or gracefully soar above the waves like dolphins, or escape from predators like frogs, all of today’s countdown creatures are built to bounce, bound and jump around.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with the ultimate Jack-of-all-trades as he immerses himself in exciting and sometimes dirty jobs caring for animals. A vet's assistant caring for Rhinos, a Bat researcher in South America, working with a King Cobra in Malaysia, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack for an adventure with rare and unique animals that all wear white. Arctic wolves, beluga whales, polar bears, white zebras and even an albino alligator!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Top Cats
programme.desc: From breathtaking tigers to elusive ocelots, lightning-fast cheetahs, leaping leopards, and the rarest lions on Earth. Join Jack Hanna for this Wild Countdown featuring 10 unforgettable encounters with nature’s top cats!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack heads into the mystical and mysterious Mashpi cloud forest in Ecuador, where the rainforest meets the Andes Mountains. The forest is buzzing with hundreds of hummingbirds, bats, snakes, and butterflies!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: The creatures on today’s show are some of the rarest in the wild. Come along with Jungle Jack as he discovers the pink river dolphin, wooly Sichuan Takin, Fiji’s crested iguana, sun-tailed monkey and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is heading into devil country in Tasmania, Australia to meet up with leading-edge researchers who are working to save Tasmanian Devils from a deadly cancer that is wiping out the population.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he braves the mighty Zambezi River in Zambia. Jack gets up and close and personal with the river's inhabitants on a kayaking adventure before heading off on a walking safari with lions and cheetahs.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he explores some of Africa's best national parks, like the world-famous Serengeti, Botswana's Chobe National Park, and Lope National Park in Gabon. Forest elephants, Leopards, Hippos, Crocs and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: The Hanna's are heading to the South Pacific island of Fiji. They get a taste of the local flavor and explore life under the surface, including a scuba diving expedition into shark-infested waters where they come face to face with a huge tiger shark!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jack and Suzi for their most incredible Costa Rican adventures, like spotting a wild Jaguar, encountering the land of the stray dogs, and meeting venomous vipers.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Hoof It
programme.desc: Giraffes, zebras, moose and bongo have very different coats, but they all wear the same shoe style. We’re talking about hoofs, of course! Join Jungle Jack as he counts down today’s featured creatures, all the way to number one!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Top of the Class
programme.desc: It's back to school for Jungle Jack as he continues his animal education in all sorts of interesting ways. From ranger school in Africa, to farrier school in Florida, and even zoo school. You never know what you'll learn on this Wild Countdown!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack behind the scenes for some of his most memorable moments like getting pecked by an ostrich, tangling with a snake, taking fashion advice from a Samburu warrior, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Everybody loves baby animals – especially Jack and Sue! Check out some unpredictable moments from undeniably cute babies like wombats, koalas, elephants -- and even a black rhino named after you know who.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jack for his favorite gorilla treks from Rwanda's Virunga Mountains. The Hanna's also visit veterinarians working with the wild gorillas, and a very special orphanage.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: On Vancouver Island, in British Columbia, Jack and his daughter Kathaleen experience Canada from above and below the water.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack's taking a Jungle Cruise through the Amazon as he searches for elusive pink river dolphins. But, along the way, Jack gets a lot more than he bargained for… from a sloth to giant river otters and even anacondas!

programme.desc: On a Hong Kong cruise: a senator romances a woman until he learns the nature of her visit; two brothers date Julie and Vicki; a compulsive shopper is offered $25,000 by her husband (Herb Edelman) if she'll resist temptation during the trip.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: An international fugitive finds love when he meets a beautiful woman with a secret, while a divorcee meets an intriguing man who conceals his identity from her and Isaac.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A rich widow comes face to face with her estranged sister, who's working on the ship as a made and whose boyfriend the wealthy woman stole and married 40 years earlier. Meanwhile, a childless couple hatches a plan to become parents.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A man bound by alimony wants to make sure his ex (Michelle Phillips) goes through with her marriage; Julie's Aunt Sylvia and her pal Betsy try to interest a publisher in Betsy's memoirs.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When a victim is gunned down at point-blank range, police often assume that a friend or acquaintance is to blame.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Handwriting Analysis: We've all heard that our handwriting tells more about our personalities than we think. Are we risk-takers, have low-esteem, fun loving, or are we capable of murder?

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When teenagers are driven to kill, their victims are but the first to fall. In three such cases, the families of the killers, as well as their communities, become the victims of violent crime.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When there's a difficult case to crack – whether it involves drugs, arson, or weapons – the investigators and scientists of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms have the means to crack it.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Terrorism: Thanks to new technology and, perhaps, the approaching millennium, terrorism is a growing international threat. The Oklahoma City explosion and the bombing of the World Trade Center are just two of the incidents of this growing problem.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: “To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth”.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Hiding a body can be difficult; it's sometimes easier to obscure or disguise the circumstances of the death, turning murder into suicide, or pinning the blame on someone else. The truth is told through subtle clues taken from the crime scene.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When killers are driven by jealousy and desire, their desperation is evident in both the crime and their efforts to avoid detection. But forensic science can reveal even the slightest mistake to solve crimes of passion.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: They know as much about crime as any crime fighter, or any criminal. They're the crime writers, and through their eyes we see murder most foul.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensics in the O.J. Simpson Murder Trial: Millions watched on television as the jury rendered their verdict. Orenthal James Simpson was found not guilty of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes the scales of justice are balanced by just a few milligrams of evidence – a couple of fibers, a tooth filling, or a smudge on a piece of tape. The biggest cases are often solved by the smallest clues.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: DNA analysis overturns the convictions of three men who have spent years behind bars, paying for crimes they did not commit.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Toxicology: While drugs can cure disease and ease pain, they can also be agents of murder. Toxicologists can examine blood and tissue to uncover cases where death is not as natural as it may seem–from slow arsenic poisoning to quick cocaine overdoses.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Photography has long been a vital tool in homicide investigations. A single image captures enough information to identify a suspect, and to preserve a vital clue long after a witness' memory fades.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.desc: Boxing robot "Battling Maxo" breaks down before the scheduled bout, forcing his manager to take its place.

programme.desc: Mr. Wilson believes he sees a gremlin on the wing of the commercial aircraft he is taking back home... from the sanitarium, where he has been committed for six months after a mental breakdown during a similar flight.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A small rescue mission braves a dangerous herd in their hunt for a missing comrade, only to discover a surprising threat that could doom them all.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El vehículo se avería y el grupo continúa a pie hacia Washington D. C., pero les sorprende una tormenta y buscan cobijo en un granero, donde encuentran algo totalmente inesperado e inquietante.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Aaron invita al grupo a Alexandria, su comunidad, un lugar que, según él, es seguro y amigable. Rick, incapaz de olvidar Woodbury y Terminus, desconfía de Aaron, pero Michonne quiere darle una oportunidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los integrantes del grupo tienen entrevistas con Deanna, la jefa de Alexandria, y esperan en las casas que les asignan a saber si son aceptados o rechazados. Cuando conocen a los habitantes de la comunidad, perciben que no están bien entrenados.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick, Daryl y Carol se reúnen en secreto para planear cómo recuperar sus armas del arsenal de Alexandria, ya que temen que, si algo sale mal, van a necesitarlas.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol le sugiere a Rick que deben asesinar a Pete porque es violento con su esposa e hijo. Por otra parte, Gabriel advierte a Deanna que desconfíe del grupo de Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Deanna y Rick se culpan mutuamente de las muertes de Aidenn y Noah. Rick le ofrece a Jessie protección ante Pete, pero este lo descubre y se enzarza en una pelea con él. La tensión en Alexandria aumenta y algo terrible se avecina.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Deanna quiere expulsar al grupo de Rick de Alexandria y ellos se preparan para defenderse. Sin embargo, la llegada de una banda de asaltantes y la irrupción de una horda de zombis interrumpen el enfrentamiento entre los dos bandos.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick y Morgan encuentran una horda descomunal de zombis en una cantera cercana a Alexandria. Entretanto, Carter convoca a varios habitantes de Alexandria para proponerles un plan: matar a Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los Lobos, el grupo con el que ya habían combatido, asalta Alexandria y empieza a acuchillar a sus ciudadanos por las calles. Durante la pelea, Enid huye de Alexandria y Ron rechaza la ayuda de Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo trata de reconducir a la horda de zombis para alejarla de Alexandria, pero el plan falla y Glenn y Nicholas terminan rodeados por muertos vivientes. Rick, por su parte, es atacado por los asaltantes que Morgan expulsó de Alexandria.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Morgan le explica a un asaltante al que mantiene cautivo cómo venció a la ira que le consumía y aprendió que el camino correcto es aquel que rechaza la violencia.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick regresa a Alexandria, donde el ánimo está decaído por la presencia de la horda de zombis y las secuelas del asalto sufrido. Maggie y Aaron salen en busca de Glenn. Denise pierde la confianza en sí misma, pero Tara la anima.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl se separa de Abraham y Sasha mientras regresan a Alexandria. Un trío de fugitivos captura a Daryl, aunque él trata de convencerlos de que se unan a su comunidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Glenn encuentra a Enid y la convence de regresar junto a él a Alexandria. Mientras, en la comunidad, Ron roba armas del arsenal y Carol se enfrenta a Morgan porque no confía en él.

programme.title: Erik Morales vs Maros Antonio Barrera
programme.desc: On February 19th, 2000 Erik Morales fought Marco Antonio Barrera for WBC and WBO World Super Bantamweight titles at Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas which ended in a split decision victory for Morales.

programme.title: Erik Morales vs Maros Antonio Barrera II
programme.desc: On June 22nd, 2002 Erik Morales faced Marco Antonio Barrera for a second time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for the WBC world featherweight title in a bout that went 12 rounds ending in a victory for Barrera.

programme.title: Erik Morales vs Maros Antonio Barrera III
programme.desc: On November 27th, 2004 Erik Morales and Marco Antonio Barrera faced eachother for the third and final time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas in a bout that went 12 rounds ending in a victory for Barrera.

programme.title: Emanuel Navarrete vs Isaac Dogboe 1
programme.desc: On December 8th, 2018, Emanuel Navarrete fought Isaac Dogboe for the WBO World Super Bantamweight Title at the Madison Square Garden Theater in New York. Navarrete was the more aggressive fighter in the match, earning the unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Emanuel Navarrete vs Isaac Dogboe 2
programme.desc: On May 11th, 2019, Emanuel Navarrete rematched Isaac Dogboe for the WBO World Super Bantamweight Title in Tucson. Navarrete put on an impressive performance, scoring two knockdowns and stopping Dogboe in the final round.

programme.title: Brandon Rios vs Mike Alvarado 1
programme.desc: On October 13th, 2012, Brandon Rios fought Mike Alvarado for the WBO Latino Super Lightweight Title in Carson, California. Showing his quickness and agility, Rios put on a show with a 7th round TKO victory.

programme.title: Chris Eubank vs Nigel Benn 1
programme.desc: On November 18th, 1990, Chris Eubank fought Nigel Benn for the WBO Middleweight Title at the Resorts World Arena in Birmingham, UK. Eubank's constant pressure on Benn and powerful punching led him to stop Benn in the ninth round.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao vs Juan Manuel Marquez 1
programme.desc: Manny Pacquiao and Juan Manuel Marquez fought their first match in 2004, resulting in a controversial draw. Both fighters displayed incredible skill, but no clear winner emerged setting the stage for their epic rivarly.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao vs Juan Manuel Marquez 2
programme.desc: On March 15th, 2008 Manny Pacquiao faced Juan Manuel Marquez the second time at Mandalay Bay Resort in Las Vegas for the WBC World Super feather weight titles with Marquez going down in round 3 Pacquiaos win was secured by split decision.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao vs Juan Manuel Marquez 3
programme.desc: On November 12th, 2011 Manny Pacquiao and Juan Manuel Marquez fought for the third time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for WBO World Welterweight titles ending in a victory for Pacquiao in this 12 round bout.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao vs Juan Manuel Marquez 4
programme.desc: On December 8th, 2012, Manny Pacquiao and Juan Manuel Marquez fought for their fourth and final fight. The bout ended in a stunning knockout victory for Marquez, solidifying their rivalry as one of the most memorable in boxing history.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh reluctantly accepts an offbeat assignment: finding a beautiful bride for his bashful buddy Charlie, the homeliest and loneliest man in the West.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: The government employs Randall to portray an escaped prisoner in order to trick his cellmate into leading authorities to the $50,000 he stole and stashed away in a secret location.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall finds his prey in the hands of a lynch mob wiping out his bounty.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Who needs enemies with friends like the residents of Rogue City, who celebrate Randall for bringing in notorious killer Jumbo Kane.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is rooked out of his bounty by crafty criminal Hunt Willis and his accomplice.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Against better judgment after losing a quick draw contest and bet, Josh serves as a guide for a dandified East Coast gun salesman who comes west to retrieve and replace a defective gun he sold to notorious outlaw Curly Bill Brocius.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: On the trail of a Cavalry deserter and the horses he stole, Josh rides into a town ruled as the private fiefdom of its autocratic, psychopathic marshal who is holding the horses and deserter.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Hired by a father to bring back the man who killed his son Josh is surprised when he doesn't get paid because he brought the man back alive.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh must bring a man back for murder.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh brings a wanted man into the Mesa City Sheriff, only to find he killed the sheriff's brother.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is looking for a man who, while trying to rob a bank, is bitten by a rabid dog.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A man shoots his brother over ownership of their property and blames it on an Indian who reclaimed his horse the man found and stole.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is captured by a corrupt deputy and is forced by the sheriff to work on a chain gang in a gold mine.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is tracking an escape artist who is forced to distract a town, letting three guys rob the bank.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh plays detective when he signs on to help an amnesiac discover his identity.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: After watching her father stabbed to death, a grieving daughter wants immediate justice rather than wait for the slower-moving wheels of justice.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is determined to debunk the dire menace posed by a marauding monster that has smashed mining camps, decimated an Indian village, and has the Nugget City residents hiding behind locked doors.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh, down on his luck, hires out for $100/day to find a woman - one catch is she may be dead.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh brings in \\"Doc\\" Phillips hoping he can lure Clell Fanning out as he has an old score to settle with Clell.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is arrested on a bogus horse-stealing charge.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: To net a thousand-dollar reward and save a friend, Josh saves Tolliver Bender from hanging so he can testify in a nearby trial.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: An attractive woman hires Josh for $1000 to clear her father on a false murder charge in a town that is not very welcoming to Josh.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh and Jason are hired to chase a killer who went to Mexico by his brother who is about to hang for a crime his brother committed.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh and Jason are on the trail of a karate expert accused of killing his employer.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall learns "hate comes high" in a town whose people have hired a trio of killers to murder their fellow resident Randy Holleran, a sniveling drunkard whom Josh can't stand but has promised his father to protect.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh captures a wanted recruit and returns him to the Army, but the Captain at an encampment refuses to pay the bounty as he has another use for the trooper.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh and Jason track down a fugitive in Texas wanted for murder in Arizona who they find is also sought by his wife who claims he is innocent.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a scheme to cheat in a race with rocket skis backfires on Crusher, Blaze and Grammy set off on a rescue.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy, but when Gormy's jet pack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Crusher's super-powered vacuum goes haywire and sucks up everything in its path, Pickle must team up with Blaze and AJ to stop the vacuum and save Crusher.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Zeg the dinosaur truck accidentally dons a set of super bouncy tires, causing him to bounce out of control.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: The Beavers fix up Ker-Splash Canyon, an amazing water park; when rushing water endangers a group of reclusive Dodos and threatens to destroy the canyon, the Cadets race underground to rescue the Dodos and save the canyon.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Penny races to save the lost treasure of Shipwreck Cove and Commodore Smurkturkski; when Rod has to stay in bed with a cold, Penny has to learn to pilot the Road-Wing on the fly.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: When Rocco and Chomps race off in Penny's Aqua-Wing, she must use Chomp's sub to get it back; as Sandy Stork delivers party treats to the school, the Banana Bandits take her plane.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: The Banana Bandits take Shirley's delivery fliers; the flying monkeys head for Commodore's hot air balloon; Penny has a play date with Anyu.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: The Cadets team up to rescue TV adventure star Survivor Bear, who comes to Big Swirl to brave Icy Summit; when Swift hurts his wing, Timmy Turtle has to help pilot the Flash-Wing to save the day.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Swift jets to the rescue when Rod's loud, exuberant singing gets him trapped in an avalanche; Swift and Brody have to rely on each other and their buddy navigating skills to lead some geese to safety in the fog.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Brody has to rescue his turbo-surfing pals when they get caught in the Shipwreck Cove whirlpool; Brody and Team Top Wing race to the rescue when Brody's little sister slips off the top of Puffin Peak.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get home in time for the Great Snowball Fight.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of "grow spice" onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away; Blaze and Pickle transform into robots to stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and Pegwheel the Pirate team up for the ultimate treasure hunt; together they must find three keys to unlock a special chest, but Crusher's sailing the high seas too, and he'll do anything to get the treasure first.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: For the first time ever, Blaze and AJ race under the ocean; Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through sunken ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and Stripes transform into jungle cats in order to race in the Animal Land Championship, but they must beat a cheating cheetah.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck's baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away; to bring him home, Blaze, AJ, and the King's adorable pet dragon, Zeek, must transform into knights in shining armor.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and his friends join the Truck Rangers, a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: In order to win the race, Blaze and his friends have to get past Crusher and his batch of cheats.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: All the fastest trucks in town are ready for the Championship Race; when Crusher steals the trophy before the race even begins, it's up to Blaze and his friends to get it back in time.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: When pirates take the island's precious lemons, the cadets must bring the treasure back to the Lemon Shack; while earning her Map Reading Badge, Penny finds pirates and must rescue the rest of the Top Wing Team.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Rod's beloved Rooster Brewster goes missing in `Arrgh Me Snugglies'; then in `Earl the Gadget Squirrel', Earl the Gadget Squirrel builds Shirley a delivery drone that goes out of control.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Baddy teams up with Betty, Chomps and Rocco to hijack the HQ Command Flyer so he can take over Big Swirl; Davey Hasselhawg has to get Cheep, Chirp and friends ready for an awesome wakeboard show when Brody is called to a rescue.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Rod and Brody try to earn a Jungle Exploring badge, but get lost and must work together to help Swift find them; when some lucky students get to be cadets for a day, Top Wing and their junior cadets end up having to rescue their teacher.

programme.title: Top Wing

programme.desc: Rod proves that he is a rooster, and not a chicken as he finds a little bear cub lost in the Haunted Cave; a jet-flying bat roars into Danger Canyon to show off his prowess.

programme.desc: Big Rig Blaze helps a dolphin named Flippy get back to his family in the ocean.
